meanings.definition: A person who holds a position of authority or trust in an organization or government.
meanings.sent1: The officeholders made important decisions for the company.
meanings.sent2: The officeholders were responsible for managing the budget.
meanings.sent3: The officeholders organized a surprise party for the staff.
meanings.sent4: The officeholders were the pillars of the organization.
meanings.sent5: The officeholders guided the team with wisdom and experience.

meanings.definition: Those who are currently in office or holding a particular position.
meanings.sent1: The officeholders attended the meeting to discuss new policies.
meanings.sent2: The officeholders were elected by the people to represent them.
meanings.sent3: The officeholders had a friendly competition for the best office decoration.
meanings.sent4: The officeholders stood out as leaders in times of crisis.
meanings.sent5: The officeholders worked tirelessly to serve the community.
